Plot: An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.
Title: Danny Collins
Actors: Al Pacino, Annette Bening, Jennifer Garner, Bobby Cannavale
tomatoConsensus: Thanks to Al Pacino's stirring central performance - and excellent work from an esteemed supporting cast -- Danny Collins manages to overcome its more predictable and heavy-handed moments to deliver a heartfelt tale of redemption.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
